title: SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard – Per-Key RGB Illumination – Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame – OLED Smart Display (Hybrid Blue Switch)
descriptions:
Level up every keypress with the SteelSeries USB Apex 5 Hybrid Mechanical Gaming Keyboard. Designed for gamers who want the crisp, tactile click of a blue switch without sacrificing smooth, quiet operation, its hybrid mechanical switches deliver satisfying feedback and reliable performance for both gaming and everyday use.

Highlights you’ll feel and see:
- Hybrid Mechanical Switches: Enjoy the tactile click of blue switches combined with a smooth membrane for precision, comfort, and durability.
- OLED Smart Display: Get at-a-glance game stats, incoming Discord messages, track info, or your own custom GIFs—no tabbing out required.
- Per-Key RGB Illumination: Create stunning lighting effects with millions of colors and dynamic per-key customization.
- Aircraft-Grade Aluminum Alloy Frame: Built from premium materials for rock-solid stability and long-lasting durability.
- Premium Magnetic Wrist Rest: Full palm support with a soft-touch finish for marathon comfort.
- IP32 Water Resistance: Extra protection against accidental spills and dust.
- Wide Compatibility: Plug-and-play with Windows, Mac OS X, Xbox, and PlayStation via USB.

Crafted to perform, built to last, and designed to dazzle, the Apex 5 is your edge in every match and your everyday typing upgrade. Make your setup smarter, brighter, and tougher—one keystroke at a time.
